name: StreamX
short_description:
Ever wanted to host your own livestream? Want to show the world your gaming skills, programming skills, or other?

Sadly, there is not much streaming software out there of reasonable quality. And most of the software is priced. Either you have to live with a trial that capps the program, does not allow OpenGL/DirectX capture, or other, or it is limited to one broadcasting website.

This project is aiming at being the first decent open source streaming tool that allows livestreaming from webcam, screen, or game, and allows editing on the go(Adding logos, adding videoclips). If you know C++, and also want a good open source, multiplpatform streaming software, join!
